LinesAnswers.name: initial
LinesAnswers.line: Young man, I'm glad to see you. You know, I used to play a lot of chess, and now life has turned out that I'm organizing tournaments. Do you know the basics of chess play? How, for example, does a bishop move on a chessboard?

responses.response: Goes to any number of fields diagonally.
Goes to one field diagonally forward.
Goes to any number of fields vertically or horizontally.

LinesAnswers.name: 2ndQuestion
LinesAnswers.line: All right, well done, young man. Do you know what is the most valuable piece in the game?

LinesAnswers.name: 3rdQuestion
LinesAnswers.line: Great, well then please the old man and answer the last question. Which piece at the beginning of the game is on the extreme squares of the extreme horizontals of the board?

LinesAnswers.name: thankYou
LinesAnswers.line: Thank you very much for the pleasant conversation, come by to chat, young man.

LinesAnswers.name: afterTalkingWithMajorNoTea
LinesAnswers.line: Hello again, good to see you! I have some cookies here, let's have a tea and chat. Would you be so kind to bring us tea?

LinesAnswers.name: afterTalkingWithMajorHasTeaNoBoyaryshnikTea
LinesAnswers.line: Hello again, good to see you! I have some cookies here, let's have a tea and chat. Would you be so kind to bring us tea?

responses.response: Here is your tea. (Give normal tea.)

LinesAnswers.name: afterTalkingWithMajorHasTeaHasBoyaryshnikTea
LinesAnswers.line: Hello again, good to see you! I have some cookies here, let's have a tea and chat. Would you be so kind to bring us tea?

responses.response: Here is your tea! (Give normal tea.)
Here is your tea! (Give tea with hawthorn.)

LinesAnswers.name: afterTalkingWithMajorNoTeaHasBoyaryshnikTea
LinesAnswers.line: Hello again, good to see you! I have some cookies here, let's have a tea and chat. Would you be so kind to bring us tea?

responses.response: Here is your tea! (Give tea with hawthorn.)

LinesAnswers.name: hasntTalkedWithMajor
LinesAnswers.line: If you even knew what foolishness they showed in 'Queen's Gambit'.

LinesAnswers.name: answeredWrong
LinesAnswers.line: Perhaps you need to think a little more.

responses.response: Let me try again, I'll go for a walk.
